game.name: Minion Surgery
game.description:
Your favorite character minion has got a big injury today. He was struggling with a strong pain and rushed directly to your hospital. You are his best friend and also a recognized medical professional, so he trusts on you blindly. Take up the charge of a doctor and be ready to provide him with the complete treatment in Minion Surgery game! We know that you love your friend minion very much, so you would not like to take chance and treat his injuries at the priority level. 

Start this brand new doctor game with taking his body go through the basis health-checkups! Check out his temperature, take his blood sample, use the stethoscope to check out his heartbeat, and get him through the x-ray machine! Once you are done, get ready to take him to the operation room and complete his surgery in the given time. Keep your eyes on the screen to check what tool your senior doctor asks you to complete his surgery!
Make sure that surgeon will get the medical equipment on time to make the surgery successful in this one of the best games for girls. You will be given 1 minute to accomplish his surgery. Get ready to move to the next level and conduct some next medical procedure, if you complete it timely. Interact, click and hold and drag the tool with the mouse on computer and do the same with tapping the screen if you explore it on mobile phone. Good luck to try out more html5 surgical games for kids on our website to nourish your doctoring skills
